alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 18 at 7:23PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow squall will affect Northern Rock island...Whiteside... Southeastern Jo daviess...Carroll...Stephenson...Jackson...Cedar... Scott...Northeastern Muscatine and Clinton counties through 830 PM CST... At 722 PM CST, a snow squall was located along a line extending from near Stockton to near Mechanicsville. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Snow...flash freeze and winds in excess of 40 mph SOURCE...Spotters...radar...observations IMPACTS...Ice covered surfaces including roadways, bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, Clinton, Freeport, Muscatine, East Moline, Sterling, Rock Falls, Maquoketa, Morrison, Tipton, Durant, Mount Carroll, Mechanicsville, Stanwood, Silvis, Eldridge and DeWitt. This includes the following highways... Interstate 74 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 260 and 306. Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 88 between mile markers 1 and 44. Interstate 280 between mile markers 1 and 10. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this snow squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads could lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes your location. A rapid drop in temperatures will lead to the rapid formation of black ice on area roadways. Black ice is nearly impossible to see and roadways may appear wet. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside
